rows.label: qst300204_msg0001
rows.name:
Nice work! Looks like you really
showed them who's boss, literally!

rows.label: qst300204_msg0002
rows.name:
Actually, I'm afraid it's not quite
over yet though.

rows.label: qst300204_msg0003
rows.name:
For your last fight, you're gonna
be facing me and Zuo!

rows.label: qst300204_msg0004
rows.name:
Beating us is sure to put this whole
thing to rest once and for all.

rows.label: qst300204_msg0005
rows.name:
Besides, watching you fight's really
got my adrenaline pumping!

rows.label: qst300204_msg0006
rows.name:
Come on! Lemme show you we ain't
the pushovers we used to be!

rows.label: qst300204_msg0007
rows.name: And give it everything you've got!

rows.label: qst300204_msg0101
rows.name:
You win, fair and square. No wonder
Vandham had his eye on you.

rows.label: qst300204_msg0121
rows.name:
You were worried about hurting us,
weren't you? I could tell.

rows.label: qst300204_msg0122
rows.name:
You tried to wear us down without
trying to really hurt us. That takes
great effort, that.

rows.label: qst300204_msg0123
rows.name:
I felt the same way whenever I went
up against Vandham.

rows.label: qst300204_msg0141
rows.name:
Heh! Looks like we'll have to up our
game next time!

rows.label: qst300204_msg0151
rows.name:
Well, I think everyone's gonna know
who's boss from now on.

rows.label: qst300204_msg0152
rows.name:
The mercs'll relax a bit now they've got
a real heavy hitter in charge.

rows.label: qst300204_msg0153
rows.name:
If we can keep this up, I reckon
we'll be as good as we were when 
the Big Man was still around.

rows.label: qst300204_msg0154
rows.name:
Let's all keep accepting missions
and aim to be the best we can be!

rows.label: qst300204_msg0155
rows.name:
Don't forget to drop by from
time to time! It'll give the mercs
a real boost!
